pages.title: Artron Capacitor
pages.text: Upgraded form of the high capacitor, sacrificing artron capacity for recharge rate. Stores up to 128 AU per capacitor, for a total of 1,280 AU, and a recharge rate of 4.0. Immensely useful, and much cheaper to make than the ultra capacitor. Can be upgraded with ultra capacitors into the temporal capacitor.

pages.title: Artron Battery
pages.text: Upgraded form of the high battery, sacrificing capacity for charge and discharge rate. Can hold up to 750 AU per battery, with a charge rate of 6.0, and a discharge rate of 0.1. Can be upgraded with ultra batteries into the temporal battery.
